Package org.firewaterframework.mappers

Class Summary
Mapper This class is the central abstraction in Firewater for converting a REST Request into a Response.
MethodMapper Responsible for parsing out the REST Method (GET, PUT, POST, etc.) and dispatching to delegate Mappers based on this information.
RouteMapper This Mapper will delegate incoming REST Requests to downstream Mappers based on the baseUrl of Request.
RouteMapper.ParseNode An internal tree representation of the urlMap to provide rapid pattern matching for incoming REST Request URLs
RouteMapper.ParseResult An aggregate return class for wrapping the resultant Mapper that can handle the incoming URL and the arguments that were collected from the incoming pattern.
